abstract: Two low-level employees of T-Mobile have created AndroidGuys, a blog dedicated to obsessive coverage of Android, the new cellphone software from Google.
snippet: Two low-level employees of T-Mobile have created AndroidGuys, a blog dedicated to obsessive coverage of Android, the new cellphone software from Google.
lead_paragraph: There are many well-known blogs that track developments in the mobile phone industry, from the Boy Genius Report to mocoNews.net.

headline.main: Do AndroidGuys Dream of Google Phones?
